paragraphs.content: Psalm 116
paragraphs.contentHtml: Psalm 116

paragraphs.content: I love the LORD, because he hath heard my voice and my supplications.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I love the Lord, because he hath heard my voice and my supplications.

paragraphs.content: Because he hath inclined his ear unto me, therefore will I call upon him as long as I live.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Because he hath inclined his ear unto me, therefore will I call upon him as long as I live.

paragraphs.content: The sorrows of death compassed me, and the pains of hell gat hold upon me: I found trouble and sorrow.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The sorrows of death compassed me, and the pains of hell gat hold upon me: I found trouble and sorrow.

paragraphs.content: Then called I upon the name of the LORD; O LORD, I beseech thee, deliver my soul.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Then called I upon the name of the Lord; O Lord, I beseech thee, deliver my soul.

paragraphs.content: Gracious is the LORD, and righteous; yea, our God is merciful.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Gracious is the Lord, and righteous; yea, our God is merciful.

paragraphs.content: The LORD preserveth the simple: I was brought low, and he helped me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The Lord preserveth the simple: I was brought low, and he helped me.

paragraphs.content: Return unto thy rest, O my soul; for the LORD hath dealt bountifully with thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Return unto thy rest, O my soul; for the Lord hath dealt bountifully with thee.

paragraphs.content: For thou hast delivered my soul from death, mine eyes from tears, and my feet from falling.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For thou hast delivered my soul from death, mine eyes from tears, and my feet from falling.

paragraphs.content: I will walk before the LORD in the land of the living.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will walk before the Lord in the land of the living.

paragraphs.content: I believed, therefore have I spoken: I was greatly afflicted:
paragraphs.contentHtml: I believed, therefore have I spoken: I was greatly afflicted:

paragraphs.content: I said in my haste, All men are liars.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I said in my haste, All men are liars.

paragraphs.content: What shall I render unto the LORD for all his benefits toward me?
paragraphs.contentHtml: What shall I render unto the Lord for all his benefits toward me?

paragraphs.content: I will take the cup of salvation, and call upon the name of the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will take the cup of salvation, and call upon the name of the Lord.

paragraphs.content: I will pay my vows unto the LORD now in the presence of all his people.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will pay my vows unto the Lord now in the presence of all his people.

paragraphs.content: Precious in the sight of the LORD is the death of his saints.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Precious in the sight of the Lord is the death of his saints.

paragraphs.content: O LORD, truly I am thy servant; I am thy servant, and the son of thine handmaid: thou hast loosed my bonds.
paragraphs.contentHtml: O Lord, truly I am thy servant; I am thy servant, and the son of thine handmaid: thou hast loosed my bonds.

paragraphs.content: I will offer to thee the sacrifice of thanksgiving, and will call upon the name of the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will offer to thee the sacrifice of thanksgiving, and will call upon the name of the Lord.

paragraphs.content: I will pay my vows unto the LORD now in the presence of all his people,
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will pay my vows unto the Lord now in the presence of all his people,

paragraphs.content: In the courts of the LORD’s house, in the midst of thee, O Jerusalem. Praise ye the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: In the courts of the Lord’s house, in the midst of thee, O Jerusalem. Praise ye the Lord.
